items.sentence: It\'s been ten years since I came to this town.
It\'s not a Thanksgiving dinner without turkey.
It\'s not always so easy to do the right thing.
It\'s not easy for me to travel alone in Japan.
Tom and Mary said they wanted to be left alone.
Tom and Mary stared at each other for a moment.
Tom and Mary stared at each other in disbelief.
Tom and Mary take turns taking out the garbage.
Tom and Mary went on a road trip around Europe.
Tom and Mary were happy until John came around.
My friend Tom has twice as many stamps as I do.
My older brother, Tom, was born here in Boston.
My parents prohibited me from seeing Tom again.
Tom heard some music coming from the next room.
Tom knows what to say to make Mary forgive him.
Tom lived in Boston until he was ten years old.
Tom met Mary this morning on his way to school.
You\'re not actually going to do that, are you?
You\'re the only person I know that owns a gun.
You\'re the only person I know who can help me.
